shows.title: Папа может
shows.plot_overview: Viktor and Vera have been happily married for 20 years. They live in a large house with four children and a dog. Viktor is a successful top manager working in the chain store "Tomato&Co". And Vera, in order to take care of the children, gave up her career as a lawyer and spends her days spinning like a squirrel in a wheel. But one day, after a not very successful working day, Viktor declares that his job is much harder than her daily concerns about the family. Then Vera, in order to take revenge
